video.title: The F Word: August 19, 2008
video.description: As practiced by the United States, Free Markets aren’t so free. They tend to require a lot of force. At that, this country excels. From silencing word of the 1791 slave revolt in Haiti so enslaved people here wouldn’t find out about it to backing cold war coups in Guatemala, Iran and Chile ,..When it comes to keeping economies set up the way corporation like it, It takes more
